name: Dinner Tonight: Cabbage Salad with Cornichons and Capers
description: This might look a lot like a coleslaw recipe, and I'll be the first to say that coleslaw isn't one of my favorite foods. I've had too many disappointing experiences with the stuff in little paper cups, tasting like it...
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup sunflower or other neutral oil
1 white or green cabbage, sliced into ribbons

recipeInstructions.text: Once 1/2 the neutral oil is incorporated, whisk in the vinegar, then the remaining oils in a slow stream.
Stir the cornichons, shallot, chives, and capers into the mayonnaise. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then toss with the cabbage.
